items.sentence: Tom is now talking with Mary over near the fountain.
Tom is on the phone talking to a customer right now.
That man speaking French to Tom is a friend of mine.
Tom has trouble making himself understood in French.
Tom is a left-handed pitcher, but bats right-handed.
I had no idea that you were having trouble with Tom.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t need to do that anymore.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t want to do that anymore.
I suspect that Tom knows why Mary doesn\'t like him.
I suspect that Tom won\'t help Mary do that anymore.
